Respiratory disease is a **death cause category**. It means that it is a collection of **death causes** and so we can compute the probability of dying from this death cause category by adding up all of its death causes. 

#### Alternative names:
* Lung disease
* Respiratory disease
* RespiratoryDiseases

#### Death causes

Respiratory disease consists of the following causes

* [Asthma](/model/Asthma)
* [Bronchitis](/model/Bronchitis)
* [COPD](/model/COPD)
* [Emphysema](/model/Emphysema)
* [Other respiratory disease](/model/Other_Respiratory_Diseases)
* [Pneumonitis](/model/Pneumonitis)

#### Categories

Respiratory disease is itself part of the following death cause categories

* [Non-violent death](/model/NonViolentDeath)

#### Risk factors

Respiratory disease has no [risk factors](/model/intro#risk-factor) in the model (yet).
